title: +++SPACIOUS 3 BED 2 BATH UNIT IN THE HEART OF EDGEWATER+++
posting_body: THIS IS A BEAUTIFULLY REFINISHED UNIT IN THE HEART OF EDGEWATER CLOSE TO EDGEWATER PARK.
THIS UNIT BOASTS ORIGINAL HARDWOOD FLOORS, BRAND NEW KITCHEN AND BATHROOM, AND NUMEROUS BUILDING UPGRADES IN 2022.
THIS IS A UNIQUE "DUPLEX UP" UNIT WITH TWO FLOORS; BOTTOM FLOOR CONSISTING OF 2 BEDS/1 BATH AND THE TOP FLOOR CONSISTING OF A SPACIOUS 1BED/1BATH TO MAKE A 3 BED/2 BATH IN THE HEART OF EDGEWATER.
ONE GARAGE AND DRIVEWAY PARKING SPOT INCLUDED.
MINUTES FROM SOME OF THE BEST RESTAURANTS CLEVELAND AND LAKEWOOD HAVE TO OFFER!
If you are interested to text{ Lisa } :-
